etymology.description: pictogram: side view of a standing man, highlighting an arm and a leg; left-side form 亻.
etymology.interpretation: Depicts a person in profile, with one stroke suggesting the torso/arm and the other the leg, hence the slightly splayed shape. In compounds it often appears as the left-hand form 亻 to mark human-related meaning; not to be confused with 彳.

examples.chinese: 他是一个很好的人(他是一個很好的人)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yí gè hěn hǎo de rén.
examples.english: He is a very good person.

examples.chinese: 我认识很多人(我認識很多人)。
这里有三个人(這裡有三個人)。
